name: Lumos Quantum Laboratory
description:
This is a short game I made for the Summer of Math Exposition. It is the first video game I've ever made and the first time I've used C# or Unity. I learnt a lot while making it, and I hope you can learn something from playing it.

This is a puzzle game, inspired somewhat by the likes of Zachtronics. The levels are intended to teach you about the basic quantum gates and how they can be used to manipulate qubits.

Due to the focus of the game, knowing how matrices and complex numbers work would be very helpful. However, I hope that the interactive experimentation available to a player allows anyone to solve the puzzles.
